duronto_express_routes.description: Premium non-stop or minimal-stop express trains for faster inter-city connectivity

routes.name: Delhi Sarai Rohilla - Jammu Tawi Duronto

features: Second highest priority on rail network after Rajdhani
LHB (Linke Hofmann Busch) coaches with anti-telescopic design
Originally non-stop, now with technical/commercial halts since 2016

stop_types.technical: Technical halt (originally for crew change/loco change, now commercial)

notes.fastest_service: Mumbai Central - New Delhi (12209/12210) with 86 km/h average speed
